origin.title: How It All Started
text: We're two computer science students who decided to take initiative. While still working toward our degrees, we found it difficult to gain hands-on experience in the tech industry. So, instead of waiting for an opportunity, we created one.

In early 2025, we launched our web development business to sharpen our skills, build real-world projects, and help others bring their ideas to life. We're passionate about clean, functional design and enjoy solving problems through code. We believe that even as students, we have something valuable to offer.

Our goal is to grow alongside our clients, delivering quality work while expanding our knowledge and expertise. Whether it's a personal portfolio or a fully dynamic web platform, we’re committed to learning, improving, and making a difference with every project we take on.

mission.title: Our Mission

sections.heading: Introduction
content: This Privacy Policy explains how Synocti ("we," "our," or "us") collects, uses, and discloses your information when you use our website, services, and products.
By using our services, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

sections.heading: Information We Collect
content: We only collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when using our contact forms. This information is used solely for the purpose of responding to your inquiries and improving our services.
• Personal Data: When you fill out a contact form, we may ask you to provide certain personally identifiable information ("Personal Data"). This may include:
- Your full name
- Email address
- Phone number (if provided)
- The content of your message or inquiry
• No Automatic Data Collection: We do not collect usage data, cookies, or track your browsing behavior on our website.

sections.heading: How We Use Your Information
content: We only use the personal information you provide through our contact forms for the following purpose:
• To respond to your inquiries or requests submitted through the website

sections.heading: Data Retention
content: We retain the information you provide through our contact forms and support tickets only for as long as necessary to respond to your inquiry or resolve your issue.
Once a support request or ticket is resolved, the data is moved to an archive for record-keeping and reference purposes. Archived data is securely stored and not actively used.

sections.heading: Data Transfer
content: We do not transfer your data to any third parties or to locations outside of our organization.
All information submitted through our website, including any personal data, is processed and stored securely within our internal systems.
We are committed to maintaining your privacy and ensuring that your information remains protected and within our control at all times.

sections.heading: Your Rights
content: Since we only collect personal information that you voluntarily submit through our contact forms, your rights regarding this information include:
• The right to access the information you submitted to us
• The right to request correction of any inaccurate contact information
• The right to request deletion of your information after your inquiry or support ticket is resolved
• The right to withdraw your request or inquiry at any time
We do not use your data for marketing, automated decision-making, or data profiling.
To exercise any of these rights, please contact us using the details provided at the end of this Privacy Policy.

sections.heading: Changes to This Privacy Policy
content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.
You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.

sections.heading: Legal Compliance

• To protect and defend our legal rights or property

In such cases, we will only disclose the minimum necessary information to comply with our legal obligations.

sections.heading: What Are Cookies
content: Cookies are small pieces of text sent to your web browser by a website you visit. A cookie file is stored in your web browser and allows the website to remember your preferences and enhance your user experience.
Cookies can be "persistent" or "session" cookies. Persistent cookies remain on your device when you go offline, while session cookies are deleted as soon as you close your web browser.

sections.heading: How We Use Cookies
content: We use a limited number of cookies to improve your experience on our website. Specifically, we use cookies to:
• Remember your selected website theme (light or dark mode)
• Remember your chosen language preference (french or english)
We do not use cookies for analytics, advertising, or tracking purposes.

sections.heading: Types of Cookies We Use
content: Functionality cookies: These cookies allow our website to remember choices you make, such as theme and language. Their purpose is to enhance your personal experience and prevent you from having to reselect settings on each visit.
We do not use essential, analytics, or advertising cookies.

sections.heading: Third-Party Cookies
content: We do not use any third-party cookies. No cookie data is shared with or collected by third-party services.

sections.heading: What Are Your Choices Regarding Cookies
content: If you prefer to avoid the use of cookies, you can disable them in your browser settings. You can also delete any cookies already stored in your browser.
Please note that if you disable cookies, your selected theme and language preferences may not be remembered, which could affect your browsing experience.

sections.heading: Changes to This Cookie Policy
content: We may update our Cookie Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated "Last Updated" date.
We recommend reviewing this policy periodically to stay informed about how we use cookies.

content: If you have any questions about our Cookie Policy, please contact us:
